overview: Genoveva, 16, lives in a small Bolivian shithole of a town in the 80Â´s. Her obsession is time. For how long it takes an ant to cross a leaf from one side to the other or the time it takes for a glass of water to fill. In the loneliness of her adolescent days, her adolescent hours, her adolescent minutes, Geno tries to survive the nuns at school, her hostile classmates, her hopeless parents, and men with guns.
title: 98 Seconds Without Shadow
